about_the_game:
[/b]Nordhold Demo: A Tower Defense Experience with Nordic Charm

Nordhold is a tower defense game for strategy enthusiasts who crave high replayability through endless combinations. In this demo, get a taste of the tactical depth and engaging gameplay as you build and manage a medieval Nordic village.

Grow Your Economy

Explore strategic development options through a variety of upgrades and meta-progression. Balance economic growth with the defense of Nordhold in a compact, demo-friendly setting.

Build Towers

In the demo, you can construct 5 distinct towers, each with unique abilities, offering a range of customization options. Strategically place and upgrade your towers to withstand 20 unique waves of enemies.

Tailored Upgrades

Discover a selection of custom upgrades in the demo, providing strategic depth and combinations to refine your defense.

Heroes, Relics, Spells & more

Choose your hero to defend Nordhold. While the demo provides a glimpse of the full game's offerings, you'll experience enough to formulate tactics and enjoy the dynamic relic system that impacts both economy and defense.

Master Escalation

Even in the demo, smart decisions create synergies that help you conquer progressively tougher waves of enemies, culminating in exciting battles.

Leaderboards

Compete with friends or globally on the exclusive demo leaderboards. Test your strategy and see if you can claim the top spot among Nordhold's defenders.

short_description: Try the demo! Build and defend your city in this Tower Defense game that blends Roguelite elements with turn-based strategy. Choose your hero, use synergistic tower upgrades, and engage in epic battles across procedurally generated landscapes.
